42 class DialogUXStateObserverInterface {
43 public:

59  IDLE,
60 
68  LISTENING,
69 
78  THINKING,
79 
87  SPEAKING,
88 
96  FINISHED,
97 
105  MEDIA_PLAYING,
106 
114  MEDIA_STOPPED,
115 
123  MEDIA_FINISHED,
124  };
125 
133  enum class AlertState {
141  READY,
142 
150  STARTED,
151 
159  STOPPED,
160 
168  SNOOZED,
169 
177  COMPLETED,
178 
186  PAST_DUE,
187

196 
204  FOCUS_ENTERED_BACKGROUND,

214  };

359 
360 inline std::string DialogUXStateObserverInterface::stateToString(DialogUXState state) {
361  switch (state) {
362  case DialogUXState::IDLE:
363  return "IDLE";
364  case DialogUXState::LISTENING:
365  return "LISTENING";
366  case DialogUXState::THINKING:
367  return "THINKING";
368  case DialogUXState::SPEAKING:
369  return "SPEAKING";
370  case DialogUXState::FINISHED:
371  return "FINISHED";
372  case DialogUXState::MEDIA_PLAYING:
373  return "MEDIA PLAYING";
374  case DialogUXState::MEDIA_STOPPED:
375  return "MEDIA STOPPED";
376  case DialogUXState::MEDIA_FINISHED:
377  return "MEDIA FINISHED";
378  }
379  return "Unknown State";
380 }
394 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const DialogUXStateObserverInterface::DialogUXState& state) {
395  return stream << DialogUXStateObserverInterface::stateToString(state);
396 }
397 
398 inline std::string DialogUXStateObserverInterface::stateToString(AlertState state) {
399  switch (state) {
400  case AlertState::READY:
401  return "READY";
402  case AlertState::STARTED:
403  return "STARTED";
404  case AlertState::STOPPED:
405  return "STOPPED";
406  case AlertState::SNOOZED:
407  return "SNOOZED";
408  case AlertState::COMPLETED:
409  return "COMPLETED";
410  case AlertState::PAST_DUE:
411  return "PAST_DUE";
412  case AlertState::FOCUS_ENTERED_FOREGROUND:
413  return "FOCUS_ENTERED_FOREGROUND";
414  case AlertState::FOCUS_ENTERED_BACKGROUND:
415  return "FOCUS_ENTERED_BACKGROUND";
416  case AlertState::ERROR:
417  return "ERROR";
418  }
419  return "unknown State";
420 }
421 
435 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const DialogUXStateObserverInterface::AlertState& state) {
436  return stream << DialogUXStateObserverInterface::stateToString(state);
437 }

Definition: DialogUXStateObserverInterface.h:331
duerOSDcsSDK::sdkInterfaces::DialogUXStateObserverInterface::DialogUXState::THINKING

duerOSDcsSDK::sdkInterfaces::DialogUXStateObserverInterface::AlertState::PAST_DUE

duerOSDcsSDK::sdkInterfaces::DialogUXStateObserverInterface::DialogUXState::IDLE
DuerOS处于空闲状态，可以进行交互。
